"Strategy used: First encoded each word from the word list and converted to a long where (a-z) corresponded to number (1-26). Then Put each encoded word into an arrayList of longs and sorted the arrayList using Arrays.sort(arrayList). Then finally Binary searched the textbox word(after encoding this as well) and using Arrays.binarySearch()

\ Scroggle is a mix and twist of famous games-word scrambles, Boggle and Scrabble..
\ 
\ In phase-1 of the game , you will select letters to form the longest dictionary word in each 3x3 small board .Your aim is to cover all the small boards with maximum length word formed in each.You have to do this before the 90 second timer goes out for each phase. Then upon entering phase-2 you have to form words using all the letters you selected in phase 1. The more letters you select in phase-1 the more words you can form in phase-2

 scoring:

1. Scrabble scoring for each letter
 2. Each letter forming a valid word will add point to the total score
 3. 2X points for 9 letter words formed in the small board during Phase-1
 4. 2X total score when game switches to phase-2
 5. 1/5 points of total score is deducted when a wrong word is formed

\ 1.Initially, You and the other player have 4 small boards each. Middle small board is locked. your aim is to form words with maximum length, using the letters in each of our boards. 2.Greater the word length is in each board, higher is the score. 3.You both will alternate turns and have 25 seconds to form a word in any one of your respective boards. 4.One who forms a 9-letter word first, unlocks the middle board, and gets a chance to form one more word and maximize their score. 5.Game finishes when both of you finish forming words in each of your boards. 6.The one with highest score wins the game.
